title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: (a) This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas
text_raw:
1. 

(a) This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas 
(Amendment) and Variation of Days and Hours (Carrickmacross 
and Monaghan) Order 2022. 

(b) This Order shall come into operation on 1st January 2023.
text_norm: 1 (a) order may cited district court district area (amendment) variation day hour (carrickmacross monaghan) order 2022 (b) order shall come operation 1st january 2023

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 5
text_raw:
2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 5 

of 1961), is hereby amended by – 

(a) The deletion at reference number 197 of the matter in columns 

(2), (3), (4) and (5) and 

(b) 

the substitution at reference number 200 for the matter in 
columns (3), (4) and (5) of the following: 

“District 
Court 
Area of 
Monaghan 

Monaghan – 

The area comprising 

First, Second, 
Third and 
Fourth Monday 
in each month. 

Third Tuesday 
in each month. 
First, Second, 
and Third 
Wednesday in 
each month. 

Carrickmacross 

Fourth 
Wednesday in 
each month. 

All sittings at 

(a) 
the Electoral Divisions of Aghabog, 
Anketell Grove, Annayalla, Anny, Ballybay 
Rural, Ballybay Urban, Ballymackney, 
Bellanode, Bellatrain, Bocks, Bragan, 
Broomfield, Caddagh, Carrickaslane, 
Carrickatee, Carrickmacross Rural, 
Carrickmacross Urban, Castleblayney Rural, 
Castleblayney Urban, Castleshane, Church 
Hill, Clones, Clones Rural, Clones Urban, 
Clontibret, Cormeen, Corracharra, Creeve, 
Cremartin, Crossalare, Currin, Dawsongrove, 
Derrygorry, Donaghmoyne, Drum, 
Drumboory, Drumcarrow, Drumgurra, 
Drumhillagh, Drummully, Drumsnat, Emyvale, 
Enagh (Carrickmacross), Enagh (Monaghan), 
Figullar, Glaslough, Greagh, Inishkeen, 
Killeevan, Killylough, Killynenagh, Kilmore, 
Kilmurry, Kiltybegs, Laragh, Lisnaveane, 
Loughfea, Monaghan Rural, Monaghan Urban, 
Mullyash , Newbliss, Rackwallace, Raferagh, 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 22nd November, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [582] 3

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not
text_raw:
4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not 
completed before commencement of this Order shall be continued and 
completed as if this Order had been in force at the time at which such business 
had been initiated. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [582] 

GIVEN under the Seal of the Courts Service 
14 November 2022 

PAUL KELLY, 
Member of the Board of the Courts Service authorised to sign 
documents under the Seal of the Courts Service. 

MAURA HOWE, 
Officer of the Courts Service designated for the purpose of 

authenticating the Seal of the Courts Service, pursuant to section 
10 of the Courts Service Act 1998. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [582] 5

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: (This note does not form part of the instrument and is not a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note does not form part of the instrument and is not a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order provides for the abolition of the District Court Area of 
Carickmacross and the creation of a new District Court Area within District 
No. 5 to consist of the territorial area formerly constituting the District Court 
area of Carrickmacross and the territorial area formerly constituting the District 
Court Area of Monaghan, the new District Court Area is to be known as the 
District Court area of Monaghan 

 
 
 
 
 
 6 [582]
